author: jerenkrantz
msg: Build with bundled apr and apr-util VPATH builds.
* configure.in: Use includes rather than includedir.

author: lgo
msg: In the test suite, don't consider the case where the socket was returned in
apr_pollset_poll an indication that there was actually any data to receive.
(replay): Before thinking we require more actions in the list than there are,
check if there's really something to read from the socket.
